title: sse-chat
description: Realtime Tchat Application using SvelteJS And Server Sent Events

scripts.build-all: (cd backend && cargo build) & (npm run build-svelte && cp -R frontend/public/ backend/public)
scripts.build-svelte: (cd frontend && export NODE_ENV=production && postcss public/tailwind.css -o public/index.css && rollup -c)
scripts.dev-all: concurrently --names 'WWW  ,rust ,roll ,tail ' --prefix-colors 'white,yellow,green,cyan' --prefix '{time}-{pid} {name}' 'npm run dev-frontend-server' 'npm run dev-backend' 'npm run dev-frontend-rollup' 'npm run dev-frontend-tailwind' --kill-others-on-fail
